name: Split universes of more than X MB
description: Split universes of more than <PARAM> MB
output: List all universes bigger than <PARAM> MB with their respective sizes. The list is sorted from the biggest universe from the smallest one.
rationale: If the universe is big this could have  an impact on the RAM available to your system.
sample: If the universe is bigger than 1MB, divide it into multiple universes. When you select File > Open, you load the universe into RAM. For example, if the universe is 1.39 MB, then it uses 1.5MB

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - Memory, Network and Disk Space Management
